channel.title: linux on Bevisy's Blogs
channel.description: Recent content in linux on Bevisy's Blogs

item.title: Burn the Operating System Installation Disk on Mac
item.description: 在Macbook上烧录iso镜像，制作操作系统盘 查看烧录U盘 diskutil list # 例如：/dev/disk3 取消挂载U盘 diskutil unmountDisk /dev/disk3 烧录 # 以 ubuntu-20.04.iso 为例 sudo dd if=~/Downloads/ubuntu-20.04.iso of=/dev/disk3 bs=1m && sync # sync 作用: 使缓存落盘 弹出U盘 diskutil eject /dev/disk3
